about_the_game:
Step into the quirky, fast-paced world of Baghead, a thrilling 10v10 capture-the-flag game that transforms an ordinary kitchen and living room into a battlefield! Join a team of ragtag players, each armed with everyday household items reimagined as hilarious weapons, and fight for glory in a chaotic yet strategic showdown. Here are some features that you can expect while playing Baghead:

  • Cross-Platform Multiplayer
    Compete with friends or strangers worldwide, regardless of their platform, for a seamless gaming experience.

  • Team Strategies
    Choose your role: be the flag runner, the defender, or the master distractor. Flexible gameplay lets players shine in their preferred playstyle.

  • Progression System
    Earn rewards, unlock new weapons and avatars, and level up as you dominate the competition.

  • Replayability
    Procedurally placed flags, varied team compositions, and unpredictable player strategies ensure no two matches are alike.

  • Baghead Specials
    Discover hidden secrets, like exclusive "Baghead Special" challenges, to earn rare rewards and bragging rights.

name: Baghead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game includes graphics settings to aid lower end devices.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Whether you're a casual player looking for a laugh or a competitive gamer hungry for action, Baghead delivers endless fun, unforgettable moments, and a unique twist on the classic capture-the-flag experience.
